entries.angry_disable: You won't get away with this. We Gotal never forget when we've been dishonored!
entries.arrival_phase_1: Stay alert, pilot. We've located your target. Stand by to engage.
entries.arrival_phase_2: The target has arrived. Watch out for its escort.
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.autorewardbody: Thank you for these medical supplies. These will be immediately be put to good use. You fee is enclosed.
entries.capture_complete: Mission Command: < Excellent, we have control of the Gotal ace's ship, and it is again ready to fly. Bring him in. >
entries.capture_phase_1: Unit has breached vessel. Subduing crew.
entries.capture_phase_2: Unit in place with full control of vessel. Repairing engine system now.
entries.capture_started: Tactical Computer: < Scanning ... ... Capture underway. Stand by. >
entries.complete: We've reached our destination. From here the medical supplies can be safely transported to the planet's surface.
entries.escort_remaining: Mission Command: < Nice one, pilot! Only %DI enemy vessels left in the area. >
entries.escort_wiped_out: Mission Command: < Excellent! The escort ships have been destroyed.>
entries.failed_destroy: Pilot, the ship was destroyed! We needed those medical supplies. Hopefully, we can try again. Go speak with Chrilooc.
entries.failed_escape: The Gotal ace's ship has hyperspaced out of the area and escaped. Hopefully we'll have another chance. Go speak with Chrilooc.
entries.panic_1: Ship sensors show incoming fighter vessels with armed weapons systems.
entries.panic_2: Ship sensors show incoming fighter vessels with armed weapons systems.
entries.quest_disable_d: Disable the Gotal bandit ace's ship so that it can be captured.
entries.quest_disable_t: Disable the Gotal bandit ace's ship.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the captured ship to a safe hyperspace jump point. Be ready! Other Gotal bandits fighters will attempt to again disable the ship so that they can regain control of it.
entries.quest_recover_d: The space assault droid is trying to get control of the ship. Keep it safe.
entries.recovery_success: That was a close one. Good work, pilot.
entries.target_disabled: Target has been disabled. We're launching the space assault droid now, keep the ship safe while it's doing its work.
entries.taunt_1: Is that the best you've got? We've got nothing to fear, then.
entries.taunt_2: Destroy them! We'll never give in!
entries.taunt_3: Scum! You'll learn to fear us!
entries.thanks_1: Ship sensors show area clear of hostile fighter vessels. Continuing flight on planned route.
entries.thanks_2: Ship sensors show area clear of hostile fighter vessels. Continuing flight on planned route.
entries.title: Kashyyyk System: Intercept a shipment of medical supplies from some Gotal Bandits.
entries.title_d: Chrilooc and his associates need you to intercept a shipment of medical supplies being transported by some Gotal Bandits. Hit them hard, capture the Gotal ace's ship, and then take the medical supplies it carries to a safe spot for transfer to the ground.
